## Description {#details}

This file provides a LoopVectorizationPlanner class.

InnerLoopVectorizer vectorizes loops which contain only one basic LoopVectorizationPlanner - drives the vectorization process after having passed Legality checks. The planner builds and optimizes the Vectorization Plans which record the decisions how to vectorize the given loop. In particular, represent the control-flow of the vectorized version, the replication of instructions that are to be scalarized, and interleave access groups.

Also provides a VPlan-based builder utility analogous to IRBuilder. It provides an instruction-level API for generating VPInstructions while abstracting away the Recipe manipulation details.

<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A class that represents two vectorization factors (initialized with 0 by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// default). One for fixed-width vectorization and one for scalable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vectorization. This can be used by the vectorizer to choose from a range of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// fixed and/or scalable VFs in order to find the most cost-effective VF to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vectorize with.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/fixedscalablevfpair"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/fixedscalablevfpair/#ae78dd0d064672fc7ce3205573fefb30d">FixedScalableVFPair</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
